definition: good or bad/good and bad/standard/quality
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: We must persist in study on for good or for evil.
sentences.chinese: 無論好壞，我們都要堅持學完。

sentences.english: Whether we will go picnicking tomorrow depends on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 明天我們是否去野餐取決於天氣好壞。

sentences.english: Results sometimes you study the performance of the test.
sentences.chinese: 成績有時候是對你學習的好壞的檢驗。

sentences.english: I ordered the best wine on the menu, regardless of price or taste.
sentences.chinese: 我叫了菜單上最好的甜酒，不管價錢多少，味道好壞。

sentences.english: And dismantle the stand or fall of a contact and the perhaps sex is great.
sentences.chinese: 而拆搭的好壞與和出的或許性聯絡甚大。

sentences.english: Environment had a great effect in locusts extermination.
sentences.chinese: 社會環境的好壞對滅蝗效果有很大影響。

sentences.english: Rewards and penalties, promotions and demotions should be based on work performance.
sentences.chinese: 要根據工作成績的大孝好壞，有賞有罰，有升有降。

sentences.english: The design of impeller meridional shape influences directly efficiency of centrifugal pumps.
sentences.chinese: 葉輪軸面圖設計的好壞直接影響離心泵的效率。

sentences.english: It has already been stated that prognostically the important factor is the histological type of cell.
sentences.chinese: 已經說明，預後好壞的主要因素是細胞的組織類型。

sentences.english: The magnetic entropy changes were the benchmark for the application of the magnetocaloric materials.
sentences.chinese: 磁熵變化值是衡量磁製冷材料好壞的一項重要指標。

sentences.english: The quality of assembled spectacles directly influences the health of wearers.
sentences.chinese: 配裝眼鏡質量的好壞直接影響眼鏡配戴者的健康。

sentences.english: Whether a planet is in good or bad state, it will realize the affairs of the house.
sentences.chinese: 行星態勢的好壞，會影響到其落入宮位所代表的領域。

sentences.english: These pictures are collected without choice.
sentences.chinese: 這些畫是不分好壞蒐集來的。

sentences.english: The only judge of how good your product is is how much your users use it.
sentences.chinese: 對你的產品好壞的唯一判定來自於有多少用戶使用它。

sentences.english: But the quality of cross-section affects the rate of returning green direct.
sentences.chinese: 然而平茬斷面質量的好壞，直接影響檸條的返青率。

sentences.english: Design work fit and unfits quality direct influence entire engineering project quality.
sentences.chinese: 設計工作的優劣直接影響整個工程項目的好壞。
